personal.name: Ricky Bhardwaj
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
personal.subtitle: Creating digital experiences that matter
personal.bio: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with a strong focus on building modern, responsive web applications. I enjoy turning complex problems into simple, elegant solutions that deliver exceptional user experiences.

projects.title: Achievement Management System
projects.description: A centralized platform for managing student achievements. Students can submit their accomplishments, mentors can review and approve/reject them, and HoDs can monitor department-wide submissions. Role-based access with audit trails and analytics.

projects.title: Tabular
projects.description: A spreadsheet-style application supporting editable cells and live formula evaluation. Designed for fast single-user performance with a lightweight table engine and dependency-aware cell updates.

projects.title: FlashDash
projects.description: An admin-user flashcard dashboard with JWT authentication. Users can browse and study flashcards by topic, while admins can create, update, and delete decks. Built with a clean UI and secure backend APIs.

projects.title: ChatHive
projects.description: A real-time MERN stack chat application using Socket.IO. Supports room-based chatting, online indicators, and dynamic user status. Built with JWT authentication and responsive chat UI.

projects.title: HashMeme
projects.description: A meme-sharing social media platform with infinite scrolling, user reactions, and trending sections. Designed with a mobile-first UI for seamless content consumption.

projects.title: Codenheimer
projects.description: A results dashboard built for a college coding contest organized by the tech society. Features smooth animations and a leaderboard-like UI where participants could check what they won. Attracted over 500+ visitors during the event.

experience.description: Contributed to the development of scalable web applications using React and Node.js. Worked closely with the team to implement new features, optimize performance, and improve user experience across platforms.
Built core platform features from scratch using React and Node.js. Implemented CI/CD pipelines and reduced deployment time by 70%.
